title: The Spinster
description: My Mom and her sisters jokingly referred to me as a spinster,I laugh it off, but deep down I’ve been worried that I would never find my person, my everything, my love.I’d resigned myself to a life alone, taught myself to never need anyone…Until Jordan that is.In the blink of an eye, he became my person, my everything, my love.Never did I dream that my person would be my nephew’s best friend,Never did I imagine I’d fall for a younger man,Never did I imagine I’d put it all on the line for him...
author: Sophia White
